column2: Tomb of Dracula Presents: Throne of Blood (2011) #1
column6: Long ago, the seeds of a vampire cataclysm were planted in the Marvel Universe.  One lone vampire rose above the rest and operated in the shadows as the world around him changed. Prepare for a clash of steel, blood, and the undead in Vampire #1, as Marvel changes the way you see vampires...and shows you the meaning of Fear Itself.
